body_html:
I have updated this pull request in response to Justine's comments. Most importantly:

  • Switched to headless chromium browser using noto fonts.
  • Defined browser target in tensorflow project:

Note this change requires a bazel version > 0.3.2 because successfully launching a Chrome based browser in the Bazel sandbox requires the new flag "--sandbox_tmpfs_path=/run/shm" (added to bazel.rc.template).

body:
I have updated this pull request in response to Justine's comments. Most importantly:
-  Switched to headless chromium browser using noto fonts.
-  Defined browser target in tensorflow project:

Note this change requires a bazel version > 0.3.2 because successfully launching a Chrome based browser in the Bazel sandbox requires the new flag "--sandbox_tmpfs_path=/run/shm" (added to bazel.rc.template).
